Ég elska íslenska tónlist.

2006-11-03

From a coworker... first time I have seen them... so nice. Do you like bells, xylophones, waterglasses, the saw, and all manner of toy instruments in harmony? Plus a set full of birds. I ♥ Iceland music.

Amina Iceland Tv Performance
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BYIDUvAtiGc
